answers.answer: Did you ask the MD why he wants you on Sugamet?  Sugamet is a safe drug, some people use it for weight loss.
Hello,this medication is metformin, I believe.  It is quite commonly used to treat PCOS (polycystic ovarian disease) in women (which affects menstrual cycle).You may research this further.

question: My doctor prescribed me Sugamet 500mg , the one used by diabetic patients to control sugar. I have irregular periods and have hormonal problems ( high prolactin levels). Should I have that medication, because I dont have diabetes. Does this medication have any side effect or create any problem for those without diabetes?
title: Can I have Sugamet even if I dont have diabetes? Urgent..
